snippet: GREEN--Alice, beloved wife of Stanley, mother of David, Douglas and Ronald, grandmother to Andrew, Joshua, Ashley, Matthew and Kevin. A Rehabilitation Counselor, she lived across the country from Brooklyn, Philadelphia and Pittsburgh to Palo Alto. A lover of laughs, Indian art, the Southwest, travel and all things chocolate. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREEN--Alice, beloved wife of Stanley, mother of David, Douglas and Ronald, grandmother to Andrew, Joshua, Ashley, Matthew and Kevin. A Rehabilitation Counselor, she lived across the country from Brooklyn, Philadelphia and Pittsburgh to Palo Alto. A lover of laughs, Indian art, the Southwest, travel and all things chocolate. 1/3
